argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvlmcl.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvlmcl.2 | |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvlmcl.3 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_imsxmet | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_lmcl | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ F ( ~~>t ` J ) P ) -> P e. X ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ F ( ~~>t ` J ) P ) -> P e. X ) |
